Name: Master Arena
About the game: Master Arena is an arena shooter with fresh gameplay using a unique inventory and perks system. Accessible to everyone, easy to handle, and satisfying to play. Duel, Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Trials, and Roball, come join arenas from 2 to 10 players. The game includes offline modes support, online dedicated servers + LAN support, and a map editor with Steam Workshop! The game can be played with a unique perks system. There are currently 9, from healing your teammates to turning invisible without forgetting flashbangs, smoke, or freon grenades. Master Arena has a dodge-based movementsâ€™ gameplay. Mastering dodges and wall-dodges give you a speed advantage in jumping around maps. 24 maps available and more under development. To ensure the best way to enjoy the game, dedicated servers are a must. Any users/community or server providers are free to start a dedicated server. To spice up your games, mutators (such as Instagib, Rocket Arena, Low Gravity, etc.) can be added independently for each map played on the dedicated server. Powered Games Entertainment.
